channel.title: CVE Feed for SonicWall -- Email Security
channel.description: The latest CVEs for SonicWall -- Email Security

item.title: CVE-2021-20023|2024-08-03T17:30:07.261Z -- sonicwall -- email%20security
item.description: SonicWall Email Security version 10.0.9.x contains a vulnerability that allows a post-authenticated attacker to read an arbitrary file on the remote host.

item.title: CVE-2021-20021|2024-08-03T17:30:07.089Z -- sonicwall -- email%20security
item.description: A vulnerability in the SonicWall Email Security version 10.0.9.x allows an attacker to create an administrative account by sending a crafted HTTP request to the remote host.

item.title: CVE-2021-20022|2024-08-03T17:30:07.423Z -- sonicwall -- email%20security
item.description: SonicWall Email Security version 10.0.9.x contains a vulnerability that allows a post-authenticated attacker to upload an arbitrary file to the remote host.

item.title: CVE-2024-22398|2024-08-01T22:43:34.875Z -- sonicwall -- email%20security
item.description: An improper Limitation of a Pathname to a Restricted Directory (Path Traversal) vulnerability in SonicWall Email Security Appliance could allow a remote attacker with administrative privileges to conduct a directory traversal attack and delete arbitrary files from the appliance file system.

item.title: CVE-2024-22398|2024-03-14T03:29:03.884Z -- sonicwall -- email%20security
item.description: An improper Limitation of a Pathname to a Restricted Directory (Path Traversal) vulnerability in SonicWall Email Security Appliance could allow a remote attacker with administrative privileges to conduct a directory traversal attack and delete arbitrary files from the appliance file system.
